categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic-aligned governments

nodes.text: A government of the Ishi Tib on the planet Tibrin was active during the Imperial Era. It was led by a high-ranking spiritual leader known as the Kalikeedan and including another high-ranking official known as the Mariod. The Ishi Tib Govi served as the Mariod during the Galactic Civil War, and the planet maintained a fleet that consisted of at least three Marsheem-class heavy cruisers. Following a mission to Tibrin undertaken by Princess Leia Organa and Luke Skywalker some time after the Battle of Yavin, the Ishi Tib joined the Rebel Alliance in their fight against the Galactic Empire, which had a presence on Tibrin.
